quotes.quote: The goal is to find a gym that fits your schedule so working out is easier for you, and you'll have few excuses for skipping.
Leave all the afternoon for exercise and recreation, which are as necessary as reading. I will rather say more necessary because health is worth more than learning.Â
The mind is the limit. As long as the mind can envision the fact that you can do something, you can do it, as long as you really believe 100 percent.
You have to train your mind like you train your body.
The vision of a champion is someone who is bent over, drenched in sweat, at the point of exhaustion, when no one else is watching.
Your health account, your bank account, they're the same thing. The more you put in, the more you can take out. Exercise is king and nutrition is queen. Together you have a kingdom.
Your mind will quit 100 times before your body ever does. Feel the pain and do it anyway.
The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
When you stay consistent with working out, you start to look good, which also leads to feeling good from the inside to the outside.
To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.Â
Bodybuilding is much like any other sport. To be successful, you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training, diet and mental approach.
I hated every minute of training, but I said, â€˜Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life a champion.
Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit.Â
Don't show up late. Don't try to slide out early. Don't cheat your rep counts. And, definitely, don't hold back. Leave it all in the gym.
A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.Â
Even if you don't have time for a big workout, stretching in the morning and night really changes your body.Â
Every time you work out you strengthen your body. Every time you don't you weaken it.
Exercise is life in motion. MOVE to LIVE!
Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.Â
Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It's about being better than you used to be.Â
Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
You're going to have to let it hurt. Let it suck. The harder you work, the better you will look. Your appearance isn't parallel to how heavy you lift, it's parallel to how hard you work.
You're only one workout away from a good mood.
No one ever drowned in sweat.
When working out, length is not a substitute for intensity.
Not only are squats not bad for the knees, every legitimate research study on this subject has shown that squats improve knee stability and therefore help reduce the risk of injuries.

When people tell me they can't afford to join a gym, I tell them to go outside; planet Earth is a gym and we're already members. Run, climb, sweat, and enjoy all of the natural wonder that is available to you.
It's not what you do in the gym that makes you fit, it's what you do all day.
Just because the summer is over doesn't mean that we should stop working out to keep ourselves in shape. Staying in shape is primarily for your health, and not just to look good on the outside.
